Title: Ode to Socialism -- Only socialism can save China, only socialism can develop China
Designer: Central Academy of Industrial Art and Design (中央工艺美术学院)
Publisher: Renmin jiaoyu chubanshe (人民教育出版社)
Notes: During the student demonstrations on Tiananmen square in Beijing in 1989, a white statue of the 'Goddess of Democracy' was erected. After the crushing of the demonstrations the authorities put this statue in its place.
